sentences.en: He raised his spear and sneak forward.
sentences.cn: 他提起长矛悄悄地前进.

sentences.en: How did he sneak off in the middle of the meeting without being noticed?
sentences.cn: 他是如何在会议中途偷偷溜走而未被人发现 呢 ?

sentences.en: I had to sneak around and hide my smoking from my parents.
sentences.cn: 为了抽烟我必须鬼鬼祟祟地躲开我的父母.

sentences.en: I managed to sneak up on him when you knocked on the door.
sentences.cn: 你敲门的时候，我设法悄悄靠近了他。

sentences.en: I saw him sneak away from us.
sentences.cn: 我看见他悄悄地从我们身边走开.
我偷偷塞给她一张纸条。

sentences.en: I want to sneak a look at his book.
sentences.cn: 我想偷偷地看一眼他的书.

sentences.en: Look it, the dirty little sneak - the murderer.
sentences.cn: 你们看, 这个肮脏家伙,这个杀人的凶手.

sentences.en: My working days were spent mooning round his department, trying to sneak a chance encounter.
sentences.cn: 上班时我在他的部门转来转去，暗中寻找巧遇他的机会。

sentences.en: Sometimes he would sneak out of his house late at night to be with me.
sentences.cn: 有时候，他会在深夜里偷偷溜出家与我相会。

sentences.en: Sometimes our expectations sneak up on us unawares.
sentences.cn: 有些时候，我们期待的事情会不期而至。

sentences.en: The sneak who took our lunch spoiled our picnic.
sentences.cn: 那个鬼鬼祟祟偷走了我们午饭的人,破坏了我们的野餐.

sentences.en: They attended a sneak preview of the winter fashion collection.
sentences.cn: 他们参观了一次对内的冬季时装预展.
你这个打小报告的家伙！
